verses.verse: Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to <S%H430>me,<s%> God, for <S%H582>man<s%> wants to swallow me <S%H7602>up.<s%> All <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3898>long,<s%> he attacks and oppresses <S%H3905>me.<s%>
My <S%H8324>enemies<s%> want to <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me up all <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4791>long,<s%> for they are <S%H7227>many<s%> who fight proudly against <S%H3898>me.<s%>
<S%H3117>When<s%> I am <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> I will put my trust in <S%H982>you.<s%>
In <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%> In <S%H430>God,<s%> I put my <S%H982>trust.<s%> I will not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> What can <S%H1320>flesh<s%> do to <S%H6213>me?<s%>
All <S%H3117>day<s%> long they <S%H6087>twist<s%> my <S%H1697>words.<s%> All their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are against me for <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
They <S%H1481>conspire<s%> and <S%H6845>lurk,<s%> <S%H8104>watching<s%> my <S%H6119>steps,<s%> they are <S%H6960>eager<s%> to take my <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Shall they <S%H6405>escape<s%> by <S%H205>iniquity?<s%> In <S%H639>anger<s%> cast <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
You <S%H5608>number<s%> my <S%H5112>wanderings.<s%> You <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1832>tears<s%> into your <S%H4997>bottle.<s%> <S%H5612>Aren't<s%> they in your book?
Then my <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H7121>call.<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H430>this,<s%> that God is for me.
In <S%H430>God,<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%> In <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I have put my <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H430>God.<s%> I will not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> What can <S%H120>man<s%> do to <S%H6213>me?<s%>
Your <S%H5088>vows<s%> are on <S%H430>me,<s%> God. I will <S%H7999>give<s%> thank offerings to <S%H8426>you.<s%>

For you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> and prevented my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling,<s%> that I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
